name: Rye Sherry Amour
description: Sherry adds a sweet-savory element to this whiskey cocktail. The Trilby's Heather Herman uses Morris Kitchen ginger syrup, but you can also make your own by adding fresh ginger to the pot when you make simple syrup.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 ounce ginger syrup (such as Morris Kitchen)

recipeInstructions.text: Fill cocktail shaker with ice, add rye, sherry, lime juice, ginger syrup, and agave. Shake well. Strain into an ice-filled Collins glass. Garnish with mint sprig.
